Articles.Content: Matton catches his breath after (successfully) flipping lander at 17 km, he will need a new flightsuit ><

Yo dawg, I heard you like docking ports so we put a docking port on your docking port so you can dock while you dock.

Congrats on the achievement! But how will he return?

Who needs to return? He's got a nice head start on the Laythe ocean front property market. Hey, maybe he brought some tools with him and can convert the capsule into a little hut or something. Either that or it's a transformer capsule!
